pkgstats_data¶

Statistics on all CRAN packages from ‘pkgstats’

Description¶

Statistics on all CRAN packages from ‘pkgstats’

Format¶

An object of class data.frame with 14834 rows and 81 columns.

Usage¶

pkgstats_data
